channel.title: An easy fix 4 u all!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/9gdlkx.png[/img]
the first two hits appear right, one below the other, however the 2nd two hits (11 , 1) appear at the bottom when they SHOULD be appearing on the left and ride side? just like the normal d claw spec. HOW DO I FIX IT? cheeeers.
